meanings.definition: Carry out a systematic or formal inquiry to discover and examine the facts of (an incident, allegation, etc.) so as to establish the truth.
meanings.sent1: The detective will investigate the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent2: The police officer will investigate the robbery that occurred last night.
meanings.sent3: I will investigate why my socks keep disappearing from the laundry.
meanings.sent4: She decided to investigate the mystery of the missing keys.
meanings.sent5: The scientist will investigate the behavior of ants in their natural habitat.

meanings.definition: Search for and gather information about (someone or something) in order to determine their true nature or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The journalist will investigate the background of the new mayor.
meanings.sent2: Researchers will investigate the effects of climate change on wildlife.
meanings.sent3: I need to investigate which plant will grow best in my garden.
meanings.sent4: He likes to investigate the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The explorer will investigate the uncharted territory for hidden treasures.
